snippet.title: Hours After Midnight | Demo Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
Dive deep into a roguelike survival quest against Rettam'diov, the Consumer of Worlds. Progress, earn experience, refine characters, and uncover potent tools. Face relentless hordes alone or amplify the thrill, teaming up cross-platform in our distinctive co-op mode.

Demo available at Steam 
https://store.steampowered.com/app/2105890/Hours_After_Midnight?utm_source=yt_demo_trailer1&utm_medium=web

Or itchio
https://tylkodemon.itch.io/hours-after-midnight

Join our Discord
https://discord.gg/EyyXuDH7AJ

#indiegame #gamedev #bullethell #bulletheaven #coop #rougelite #rougelike #indiegamedev
